meanings.definition: The rounded curvature of a person's body, especially a woman's bust.
meanings.sent1: She wore a dress that accentuated her embonpoints.
meanings.sent2: Her embonpoints looked elegant in the evening gown.
meanings.sent3: The necklace she wore drew attention to her embonpoints.
meanings.sent4: Her embonpoints were like two gentle hills on her chest.
meanings.sent5: The tailor carefully measured her embonpoints for the perfect fit.

meanings.definition: To emphasize or highlight the curves of a person's body, particularly the bust.
meanings.sent1: The designer used strategic cuts to embonpoint her figure.
meanings.sent2: She knew how to embonpoint her best features with the right outfit.
meanings.sent3: He jokingly said he could embonpoint anyone with his magic wand.
meanings.sent4: Her confidence embonpoints her beauty more than any dress.
meanings.sent5: The photographer knew how to embonpoint her curves in the photoshoot.

meanings.definition: Having a full, rounded figure, especially in the bust area.
meanings.sent1: She admired her embonpoints in the mirror.
meanings.sent2: The dress hugged her embonpoints perfectly.
meanings.sent3: Her embonpoints made her the center of attention at the party.
meanings.sent4: The actress's embonpoints were the envy of many.
meanings.sent5: The embonpoints of the mannequin made the dress look stunning.
